name: Aeonus
effect:
Flip 2, Assault 3, Long-Range

Entrance: A random Raider skips their next turn.

When Aeonus flips the second Caverns card on his turn, if it does not share a type with the first Caverns card flipped this turn, flip an additional Caverns card.
"Let us see what fate has in store ..."

name: Aessina's Boon
effect:
Attach to target ally, then put two 1 / 1 Treant ally tokens into play.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1 for each ally you control.
"Spirit of the forest, grant me your blessing!" - Tarwila Gladespring

name: Alex Iskandar
effect: Unity: While you control three or more Human allies, opposing allies have -1 ATK.
"No man will perish on my watch."

name: Amani Venom-Axe
effect: You pay (1) more to strike with this weapon for each card in your hand.
The Amani forest trolls were well-known for their vicious weaponry.

name: Anetheron
effect:
Boss

Absorb

Caverns Hero 2+: Anetheron has Assault 1 for each Caverns hero that has been defeated.
"Scream for me."

name: Arcane Enlightenment
effect:
Ongoing: When you play an ability, add a knowledge counter to this ability.

When there are fifteen or more knowledge counters on this ability, you can play abilities from your graveyard.
"Create the path of least resistance from the Nether to your mind." - Bianca, Timewalker Mage

name: Archimonde the Defiler
effect:
Flip 1, Assault 4, Long-Range

Entrance: Flip a Caverns card for each Caverns hero that has been defeated.

When a Caverns card is flipped, do the following:
Ally: Each Raider chooses and destroys an ally he controls.
Ability: Each Raider chooses and discards a card.
Event: Each Raider chooses two face up resources he controls and turns them face down.
"This world will burn!"

name: Archimonde, Hand of Sargeras
effect:
Smash

When Archimonde enters play, he smashes 7 shadow damage to target opposing ally.
"All creation will be devoured!"

name: Bad Seed
effect:
Attach to target ally and exhaust it.

Ongoing: The first time attached ally would ready during each of its controllerâ€™s ready steps, it doesnâ€™t instead.

At the start of attached ally's controller, he may pay (1) for each Ongoing ability you control. If he does, he readies attached ally.
"It appears I've introduced an invasive species to your ecosystem." - Toho Bloomhorn

name: Bolster
effect: Add two +1 counters to target armor.
"The Light helps those who help themselves."

name: Boltaar, Shield of Velen
effect:
Protector

Equipment and Ongoing abilities you control have Spellshield
"To protect the Prophet is to protect far more than his physical body."

name: Brazen Theft
effect:
Play only if your hero dealt combat damage to an opposing hero this turn.

Look at target player's hand and choose a card. That player discards that card.
"Zzzzz ..."

name: Breastplate of the Queen's Guard
effect:
This armor enters play with two +1 counters on it.

Remove a +1 counter from this armor → Target ally or weapon has +2 ATK this turn.
"Still these strangers would oppose your queen's will. Who will stop them?" - Queen Azshara

name: Bristleblitz Striker
effect:
Long-Range

When you play an ability, this weapon has +1 ATK this turn.
"Bow to my will!" - Archimonde

name: Call of the Legion
effect:
Each Raider chooses and discards two cards.

If Archimonde is the Caverns hero, flip two additional Caverns cards.

name: Carrion Swarm
effect:
The Caverns hero deals 4 shadow damage to each Raiding hero, and 2 shadow damage to each Raiding ally.

Ongoing: Raiding heroes and allies can't be healed.

When a Caverns hero is defeated, destroy this ability.
"The swarm is eager to feed ..." - Anetheron

name: Cataclysm's Edge
effect: When this weapon enters play, each player chooses one ability, weapon, armor and item he controls, then destroys the rest.
"I am the coming of the end!" - Archimonde

name: Choker of Serrated Blades
effect:
This item enters play with three blade counters.

(1), , Remove a blade counter → Choose one: add a +1 ATK counter to target weapon; or add a +1 counter to target armor.

When the last blade counter is removed from this item, destroy it.
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Dark Dissolution
effect:
Remove up to one ability, one ally, and one equipment in target opponent's graveyard from the game.

Your hero deals shadow damage to up to one target ally equal to the cost of an ally removed this way, heals damage from itself equal to the cost of an ability removed this way, and deals shadow damage to up to one target hero equal to the cost of an equipment removed this way.

name: Darkflame
effect: Your hero deals unpreventable shadowfire damage to target hero or ally equal to the combined ATK of a card and a card you control. (This counts as both shadow and fire damage.)
"Flames cast shadows, and so do I." - Tessa Black

name: Darthrohan's Ceremonial Hammer
effect: (2), → Remove target friendly ally from the game, then return it to play under its owner's control.
"Thrall will never be free!" - Captain Skarloc

name: Demonic Pact
effect:
This ability enters play with X pact counters on it.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put 1 damage on your hero, draw a card, and remove a pact counter from this ability. Then, if none remain, destroy this ability.
When you're a warlock, there's no such thing as a long-term goal.

name: Devourer of Time
effect:
Each Raider puts an ability, ally, and equipment he controls into their owner's hands.

If Aeonus is the Caverns hero, each raider puts all abilities, allies, and equipment he controls into their owner's hands.

name: Dirty Distraction
effect: Exhaust each opposing ally and equipment with cost 4 or less. Those cards can't ready during their controller's next ready step.
"Guess you could call my agility 'stunning'!" - That rogue no one likes

name: Distortion Bomb
effect: Choose one of the following at random: Destroy all Raiding abilities, allies and equipment with an even cost; or destroy all Raiding abilities, allies, and equipment with an odd cost.

name: Doom
effect:
Attach to the MARKED hero.

Ongoing: At the start of the Caverns hero's turn, put the top card of attached hero's controller's deck into his graveyard. If an ally was put into a graveyard this way, put a 5 / 5 Doomguard Demon Monster ally token into play.
"Don't fight it." - Kazrogal

name: Doomfire
effect:
Attach to the MARKED hero and put a flame counter on this ability.

Ongoing: At the start of the Caverns hero's turn, choose one at random: Put a flame counter on this ability; or the Caverns hero deals fire damage to attached hero equal to the number of flame counters on this ability.
"Malanach shreek thresh!" - Archimonde

name: Doomguard Devastator
effect: When this ally enters play, exhaust all opposing heroes and allies with Protector.
These doomguards assissted Mannoroth in his siege at Zin-Azshari.

name: Dread Force
effect:
Exhaust all Raiding heroes and allies.

If Mal'Ganis is the Caverns hero, double his ATK this turn.

name: Earthen Burst
effect:
Your hero deals 2 nature damage to target ally.

Target ally has +2 ATK this turn.
"This one'll smart!" - Barador, Wildhammer Timewalker

name: Echo of Death
effect:
Put two 3 / 3 Ghoul ally tokens into play.

If Sylvanas is the Caverns hero, put four into play instead.

name: Echo of Sylvanas
effect:
Flip 2, Assault 3, Long-Range

Entrance: Put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play for each Caverns hero that has been defeated.

At the start of Sylvanas' turn, put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play. Then, if she controls five or more Ghouls, she deals 10 shadow damage to each Raiding hero.
"Watch, heathens, as death surrounds you!"

name: Echo of Tyrande
effect:
Flip 2, Assault 4, Long-Range

Entrance: Tyrande deals 3 arcane damage to each Raiding hero for each Caverns hero that has been defeated.

When Tyrande deals damage to a Raiding hero, if she has dealt 10 or more damage to that hero this turn, reveal cards from the top of the Caverns deck until a Boss ally is revealed. Put that ally into play and shuffle the other revealed cards into the Caverns deck. This power triggers only once per turn for each Raiding hero.
"Eyes of the night, pierce this darkness!"

name: Epoch Hunter
effect:
Boss

When Epoch Hunter enters play, the Caverns hero has +3 ATK this turn.

Caverns Hero 2+: Each Raid ability attached to a Raiding hero triggers an additional time at the start of the Caverns hero's turn.
"You cannot fight fate!"

name: Eruption Trap
effect:
Trap

Remove your defending hero from combat. If you do, your hero deals 4 fire damage to target hero.
"Nothing burns like knowing you've made a dire error. Besides fire, of course." - Xander Blackcrow

name: Fel Stalker
effect: This ally has +3 ATK while attacking a Raiding hero with no ready resources.
The fel stalker's tentacles drain magic from its victims.

name: Felblade
effect:
The Caverns hero has Assault 2 this turn.

Ongoing: When the Caverns hero deals combat damage to the MARKED hero, the Caverns hero deals that much fire damage to each other Raiding hero.

When a Caverns hero is defeated, destroy this ability.
"Fall and DIE before me!" - Mannoroth

name: Felguard
effect: This ally attacks the Raiding ally with the highest remaining health if able.
Even the strongest heroes face a challenge in these single-minded soldiers of the Legion.

name: Flamesoul Weapon
effect:
Attach to target weapon.

Ongoing: Attached weapon has +ATK equal to the highest ATK among allies you control.
"Why work hard for power when you can get it from your buddies on the cheap?" - Moxxi the Shock Broker

name: Freeze Out
effect: Up to three target resources can't ready during their controller's next ready step.
"Fool! You have no power here!" - Korgen Skullcleaver

name: Get Down!
effect: Target armor you control can prevent damage that would be dealt to allies you control this turn.

name: Ghoulish Epidemic
effect: When a non-token ally is destroyed this turn, put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.
"There are skeletons in every closet, and corpses in every field." - Ansem, Timewalker Deathblade

name: Giant Infernal
effect: At the start of the Caverns hero's turn, this ally deals 10 fire damage to the MARKED hero.
It's easy to mistake a summoned Infernal for a falling meteor.

name: Gor'la Wrathbolt
effect:
This ally can attack only heroes.

Bloodrush: While an opposing hero has more damage on it than your hero, this ally has Ferocity.
"Take in the scents of ozone and blood in the air with your last breath."

name: Greaves of the Martyr
effect:
This armor enters play with two +1 counters on it.

Remove a +1 counter from this armor → You pay (2) less to strike with Melee weapons this turn.
"You cannot fight fate!" - Epoch Hunter

name: Grievous Wounds
effect: Double the damage on each opposing ally.
"You won't walk away from this fight, fiend." - Alex Iskandar

name: Guardian's Shield
effect: Ongoing: If an ally you control would be dealt non-fatal damage, prevent it.
"Faith, my friend, is all that stands between us and death."

name: Hammer of Atonement
effect:
If your hero would heal damage, it heals double that much instead.

While your hero is undamaged: (4), → Put a 4 / 4 Guardian Spirit ally token into play with Protector.
The races of the Legion likely lost all traces of guilt long ago, burned away by Sargeras' dark power.

name: Hand of Retribution
effect:
Attach to target friendly ally.

Ongoing: When damage is dealt to attached ally, it deals unpreventable holy damage equal to its ATK to the source of that damage.
"To share even a bit of the zeal we possess with an ally is enough." - Alundra, Sin'dorei Timewalker

name: Hellfire-Encased Pendant
effect:
→ Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero for each ally you control.

→ Your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each ally you control.
It appears to be burning, but it's oddly soothing to the touch ...
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: High Arcanist Eldrissa
effect:
Elusive

When this ally enters play, remove the top three cards of target opponent's deck from the game face down. You and only you may look at cards removed this way at any time.

(2), Put a card removed this way into its owner's graveyard → Interrupt target card if it has the same name as that card.
"To master the arcane is to measure all possible outcomes - then create a new one."

name: Howl of Azgalor
effect:
Ongoing: Raiders can't play abilities.

When a Caverns hero is defeated, destroy this ability.
"No one is going to save you." - Azgalor

name: Hunting Preparations
effect: Ready up to three face-up resources you control.
"A clear head, a bow, and a quiver of very sharp arrows. That's all you need." - Nalisa Nightbreeze

name: Icy Impediment
effect: Ongoing: Each opposing equipment can't exhaust unless its controller pays (1).
"I like you just the way you are." - Bianca, Timewalker Mage

name: Infinite Suppressor
effect: Raiding allies lose and can't have powers.
Those who have faced the dark magics of the Infinite Flight know the horrors it can wreak.

name: Infinite Warden
effect: This ally attacks the Raiding ally with the lowest remaining health if able.
Murozond's loyal troops are more than willing to snip a loose thread of fate.

name: Jaina's Staff
effect:
When this weapon enters play, remove the top four cards of your deck from the game.

→ Choose an ability removed this way. You may play that ability this turn. (Pay costs as normal.) When you do, copy each other non-Ongoing ability removed this way. You may play those copies without paying their costs.
"I don't know who you are, but I'll defend this shrine with my life." - Echo of Jaina

name: Katu Lion's-Claw
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, target ally has +2 ATK and Stealth this turn.
Druids in cat form are a real source of pride.

name: Kaz'rogal
effect:
Boss

When Kaz'rogal enters play, he deals 4 shadow damage to the hero of each Raider that controls no ready resources.

Caverns Hero 2+: Kaz'rogal has Assault 1 for each exhausted resource the MARKED hero controls.
"Your death will be a painful one."

name: Kaz'rogal's Hardened Heart
effect: Opposing allies enter play exhausted.
"Cry for mercy! Your meaningless lives will soon be forfeit." - Kaz'rogal

name: Light's Embrace
effect: Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand. Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's cost.
"Live your life in the Light, and the Light will live in you." - Tavish Hearthglow

name: Lord of the Pit
effect:
The first time the Caverns hero attacks this turn, ready him.

If Mannoroth is the Caverns hero, when he deals combat damage to an opposing hero this turn, put a 5 / 5 Doomguard Demon Monster ally token into play.

name: Lorraina the Red Harbinger
effect:
When this ally enters combat, she may deal 2 ranged damage to target attacker or defender.

When this ally deals damage to a hero or ally, you may ready a resource you control.
"Enemies will find me less than charitable."

name: Mal'Ganis
effect:
Flip 2, Assault 3

Entrance: Mal'Ganis deals 1 shadow damage to each Raiding hero and ally for each Caverns hero that has been defeated.

Mal'Ganis has an additional Assault 5 while attacking a Raiding hero with less damage on it than Mal'Ganis.
"I've been waiting for you, young prince."

name: Mallory the Maniacal
effect:
This ally enters play with 2 damage on her.

This ally has Assault 4 and Spellshield
"Oh, just you wait."

name: Mannoroth the Destructor
effect:
Flip 1, Assault 8, Smash

Mannoroth has +5 and an additional Assault 2 for each Caverns hero that has been defeated.

Mannoroth must attack the ally with the lowest remaining health if able.
"Come, Stormrage, and I will show you what happens to those that betray the lord of the Legion!"

name: Mannoroth the Flayer
effect:
Protector

Other allies you control have Assault 2.

Non- allies opponents control have -2 ATK.
"A worthy effort ... but futile."

name: March of the Treants
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a 1 / 1 Treant ally token into play.
"The forest does not root idly by while under attack." - Strongroot, Ancient of War

name: Mark of Kaz'rogal
effect:
Attach to the MARKED hero.

Ongoing: At the start of the Caverns hero's turn, attached hero's controller chooses one: the Caverns hero deals 6 shadow damage to attached hero; or the Caverns hero deals 3 shadow damage to each other Raiding hero.
"You ... are marked." - Kaz'rogal

name: Mass Revival
effect: Put up to three target allies from your graveyard into your hand.
The Light is capable of truly wondrous deeds when wielded with the right hands.

name: Meathook
effect:
Boss

When Meathook enters play, exhaust all Raiding heroes and allies.

Caverns Hero 2+: Raiding allies that can attack must attack Meathook if able.
"Get up! Me not done!"

name: Moonstrike
effect:
The Caverns hero deals 10 arcane damage to the Raiding heroes divided as the Raiders choose.

If Tyrande is the Caverns hero, she deals 30 arcane damage to the Raiding heroes divided as the Raiders choose instead.

name: Murozond
effect:
Long-Range

If Murozond is the first Caverns hero, put him on the bottom of the Caverns hero pile.

Entrance: Put a time counter on Murozond for each Caverns hero that has been defeated.

At the start of Murozond's turn, put a time counter on him.

Murozond has Flip X and Assault X, where X is the number of time counters on him.
"To repeat the same action and expect different results is madness."

name: Nordrassil Scout
effect: When this ally enters play, you pay (3) less to complete your next quest this turn.
"Targets approaching from the south. Get ready."

name: Northshire Guardian
effect:
Protector

When an attacker deals combat damage to this ally, that attacking character can't ready during it's controller's next ready step.
"Light help you. You've made a dire mistake ..."

name: Pacify
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: You control attached ally.

Attached ally can't attack.
"Remain calm ... not that you have a choice." - Virendra Moonglow

name: Peroth'arn
effect:
Boss

When a Raiding hero would be dealt damage, it's dealt that much +1 instead.

Caverns Boss 2+: Flip 1
"How long can you delay your doom?"

name: Peroth'arn's Belt
effect:
This armor enters play with two +1 counters on it.

Remove a +1 counter from this armor → Target hero or ally has Stealth this turn.
"The shadows serve ME, now ..." - Peroth'arn

name: Psychic Duress
effect:
Attach to target hero, and put three coercion counters on this ability.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, attached hero's controller may discard a card. If he does, remove a coercion counter from this ability. Otherwise, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero for each coercion counter on this ability.
Damned if you do, damned if you do.

name: Queen Azshara
effect:
Flip 2

Azshara enters play with six guard counters on her.

If Azshara would be dealt damage, remove a guard counter from her instead. Then, if none remain, she is defeated.

At the start of Azshara's turn, each Raider puts the top two cards of his deck into his graveyard. Put a guard counter on Azshara for each raider that puts cards into his graveyard with a combined cost of 8 or higher.

While Azshara has twelve or more guard counters on her, she has an additional Flip 2, and Caverns allies have Assault 2.
"I am unimpressed."

name: Queen of Madness
effect:
Flip an additional Caverns card for each Caverns hero that has been defeated.

If Azshara is the Caverns hero, put four guard counters on her.

name: Raging Earth Elemental Totem
effect:
Ongoing: When this Totem enters play, put two 2 / 1 Earth Elemental ally tokens into play.

Other allies you control have Protector.
"Do the earth a favor, lad! Ye never know when it might pay ye back!" - Barador, Wildhammer Timewalker

name: Raid Warning: Annihilation
effect:
Ongoing: At the start of the Caverns hero's next turn, a random Raider destroys all abilities, allies, and equipment he controls, then remove this event from the game.

Exhaust two friendly allies that share a or race → Destroy this event. Any Raider may use this power.

name: Raid Warning: Dark Summoning
effect:
Ongoing: At the start of the Caverns hero's next turn, flip two additional Caverns cards, then remove this event from the game.

Exhaust two friendly allies that share a or race → Destroy this event. Any Raider may use this power.

name: Razor Hill Lout
effect: (1) → Remove this ally from combat.
"I don't think anybody'll mind if I nod off for a few ..."

name: Reverse Polarity
effect: Interrupt target ability.
"Arcane magic doesn't follow normal rules of nature. Opposites definitely do not attract." - Belmaril, Timewalker Bloodmage

name: Rioriel Whitefeather
effect:
Haste 2

When this ally enters play, he heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

When this ally deals damage to a hero, you may return him to his owner's hand.
"I have explored the world twice over, but Darnassus will always be my home."

name: Robes of Rhonin
effect:
This armor enters play with two +1 counters on it.

Remove a +1 counter from this armor → The next time your hero would deal damage with an ability this turn, it deals that much +1 instead.
Rhonin's participation in the War of the Ancients helped turn the tide in favor of the night elves.

name: Salramm the Fleshcrafter
effect:
Boss

Salramm attacks the ally with the lowest remaining health if able.

Caverns Hero 2+: When Salramm deals fatal damage to a defending ally, put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.
"Ah, the entertainment has arrived!"

name: Salvo
effect: Your hero deals 4 ranged damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
"I don't really understand how it's possible either, but I can't argue with the results." - Xander Blackcrow

name: Shadow Strikes
effect:
Add a +1 ATK counter to each weapon you control.

Your hero deals shadow damage to target hero or ally equal to the combined ATK of Melee weapons you control.
Rogues have always employed a bit of minor mysticism in their trade - some slightly less minor.

name: Shattering Strike
effect: Destroy target armor or item.
After spending millions of gold on research gnomish tinkerers triumphantly announced that a big piece of metal is less effective when shattered into a million pieces.

name: Soul Binding
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +2.

If attached ally would deal shadow damage, it deals double that much instead.

name: Spy of Kilrogg
effect: Name a card, then target opponent reveals his hand. If the named card is in that player's hand, your hero deals 5 shadow damage to that player's hero, and you draw a card.
Many spies have many eyes, but this creature is both.

name: Sunhoof Consecrator
effect: Ready allies you control have +2 ATK and Spellshield
"Together we are prepared for anything."

name: Swirling Flames
effect: This turn, your hero has " (1) → Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally."
"They don't call me a spitfire for nothin'." - Lyra, Timewalker Embermage

name: The Unbreakable Will
effect: This weapon enters play with a +1 ATK counter for each face-up resource you control.
"The clock ... is still ... ticking." - Anetheron

name: Thornwood Staff
effect:
→ Exhaust target card.

On an opponent's turn: → Ready another target card.
"Highguard, to arms! For your queen! For Azshara!" - Captain Varo'then

name: Time Fracture
effect:
Switch the ATK and Health of each Raiding ally this turn.

If Murozond is the Caverns hero, double the number of time counters on him.

name: Time-Twisted Footman
effect: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to this ally by Raiding allies with an odd cost.
Trapped in time, these spirits guard the distraught echo of Jaina Proudmoore.

name: Time-Twisted Huntress
effect: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to this ally by Raiding allies with an even cost.
Tyrande's loyal guards stayed with her until the end, their cries of anguish echoing through time.

name: Torkar the Bloodsworn
effect:
Protector

When your hero is dealt combat damage, destroy this ally.
"With my life taken, my word is all I have."

name: Totemic Infusion
effect: Ongoing: While you control an Air Totem, your hero has Spellshield
"The whispers of the ancestors and the elements have become one."

name: Tracker's Blade
effect:
Dual Wield

Stealth
"It will be much colder in your grave." - Rage Winterchill

name: Tribulation
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, each opponent puts a card from the top of his deck into his graveyard for each hero and ally he controls.
"Every action has consequences." - Darris Leafshade

name: Umbral Assault
effect: Ongoing: If one or more cards from the top of an opponent's deck would be removed from the game, remove that many +1 instead.
"You will pay. Dearly." - Dohna Darksky

name: Veteran's Tactics
effect:
Attach to target armor or weapon.

Ongoing: Attached card has +3 ATK if it's a weapon.

Attached card has +3 DEF if it's an armor.

(2) → Reattach this ability to another target armor or weapon.
"Remember the origin of every chip on your sword, of every crack in your shield." - Lara, Timewalker Commander

name: Vorn, Hand of Baine
effect:
Opposing allies must attack this ally if able.

Prevent all damage that this ally would be dealt with abilities.
"I feel as if I have lived the warrior's life a dozen times. This is what I was born to be."

name: Wild Swipes
effect: Ongoing: Your hero has Assault 2 while you control a form.
"Keep your senses sharp and your claws sharper." - Katu Lion's-Claw
